text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No matter the race, aiming for 
victory is a given.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But…… simply winning is not enough.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have a duty to overwhelm all others, 
with elegance and splendor.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
—— Let me show you how a Mejiro runs, 
even on a stage as big as the Tenno Sho.
